segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even notice the water pouring over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she just keeps polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are right behind her, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching for the cookie jar like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it’s about to tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her share, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe no one is reacting to any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading fast, but the woman just keeps working.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout at them to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR
